title: Matchsafe, "Filigree Shoe", late 19th century
markings: Partially impressed 84 (?), illegible maker's mark, unidentified coat of arms all stamped on underside of lid.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the shape of a shoe or ankle boot,  the body composed of decorative, scrolling, lacy, filigree motifs,  incised decoration on solid lid at top. Loop at back above heel. Lid hinged at top. Striker on front sole at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Filigree Shoe", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-70.
